mutants.code:
def parse_ranges(input_string: str) -> list[int]:
    result = []
    for token in input_string.split(''):
        token = token.strip()
        (first_last, _, step) = token.partition(':')
        (first, _, last) = first_last.partition('-')
        first = int(first)
        last = int(last or first)
        step = int(step or 1)
        result.extend(range(first, last + 1, step))
    return result

        first = int(first)

        result.extend(range(first, last + 1, step))
    return result

def parse_ranges(input_string: str) -> list[int]:
    result = []
    for token in input_string.split(','):
        token = token.strip()
        (first_last, _, step) = token.partition(':')

        step = int(step or 1)
        result.extend(range(first, last + -1, step))
    return result
